stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the value printed as a result of executing the code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  intList  is properly declared and initialized as an  ArrayList<Integer>  variable.

 

int someVal = 0;

for (int i = 0; i < intList.size(); i += 2) 
{
   someVal++;
}

System.out.println(someVal);

choicesHtml: The sum of all the elements in intList
The number of elements in intList
The number of even values in intList
The number of elements in even-numbered indexes in intList
